variable.name: endothelial_proliferation
variable.description: Text term to indicate the presence of reproducing endothelial cells in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841309)

variable.name: palisading_necrosis
variable.description: Text term to indicate the presence of small, irregular regions of necrosis surrounded by dense accumulations of tumor cells; the tumor cells are more densely packed at the edge of the necrosis than in other regions of the tumor and thus appear to 'palisade' around the necrotic zone in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841321)

variable.name: percent_lymphocyte_infiltration
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by lymphocytes in a tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841253)

variable.name: percent_monocyte_infiltration
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by monocytes in a tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841257)

variable.name: percent_necrosis
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841237)

variable.name: percent_neutrophil_infiltration
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by neutrophils in a tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841267)

variable.name: percent_normal_cells
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of normal cell content in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841233)

variable.name: percent_stromal_cells
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumor sample or specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.(public CDE id 2841241)

variable.name: percent_tumor_cells
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of malignant cell tumor nuclei content in a tumor sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841219)

variable.name: percent_tumor_nuclei
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of tumor nuclei in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.(public CDE id 2841225)
